passages.text:
Do you want to hear the story of how I died?
[[Yes.]]
[[Not really, honestly.]]
[[I've been DYING to hear this.]]
[[Yes, if you feel like telling me.]]

links.name: Yes.
links.link: Yes.

links.name: Not really, honestly.
links.link: Not really, honestly.

links.name: I've been DYING to hear this.
links.link: I've been DYING to hear this.

links.name: Yes, if you feel like telling me.
links.link: Yes, if you feel like telling me.

passages.name: root

passages.text:
Yes.
[[Charles I, King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.]]

links.name: Charles I, King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.
links.link: Charles I, King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.

passages.name: Yes.

passages.text:
Not really, honestly.
[[Well, I'm going to tell you anyway. The King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.]]

links.name: Well, I'm going to tell you anyway. The King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.
links.link: Well, I'm going to tell you anyway. The King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.

I've been DYING to hear this.

links.name: Charles I, King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.

Yes, if you feel like telling me.

passages.name: Charles I, King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.

Well, I'm going to tell you anyway. The King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.
[[Continue]]

links.name: Continue
links.link: Continue

passages.name: Well, I'm going to tell you anyway. The King of Britain had ordered a clock from me. This was to be a life-changing order.

passages.text:
Continue
[[He ordered a jewel-encrusted, gold-plated grandfather clock. It was to be of the highest quality, and the payment offered for it reflected that as well.]]

links.name: He ordered a jewel-encrusted, gold-plated grandfather clock. It was to be of the highest quality, and the payment offered for it reflected that as well.
links.link: He ordered a jewel-encrusted, gold-plated grandfather clock. It was to be of the highest quality, and the payment offered for it reflected that as well.

passages.name: Continue

passages.text:
He ordered a jewel-encrusted, gold-plated grandfather clock. It was to be of the highest quality, and the payment offered for it reflected that as well.
[[Continue 1]]

links.name: Continue 1
links.link: Continue 1

passages.name: He ordered a jewel-encrusted, gold-plated grandfather clock. It was to be of the highest quality, and the payment offered for it reflected that as well.

passages.text:
Continue
[[This was a very great honor, and one that was sure to bring me business for the rest of my life. The King only orders from the best.]]

links.name: This was a very great honor, and one that was sure to bring me business for the rest of my life. The King only orders from the best.
links.link: This was a very great honor, and one that was sure to bring me business for the rest of my life. The King only orders from the best.

passages.name: Continue 1

passages.text:
This was a very great honor, and one that was sure to bring me business for the rest of my life. The King only orders from the best.
[[Continue 2]]

links.name: Continue 2
links.link: Continue 2

passages.name: This was a very great honor, and one that was sure to bring me business for the rest of my life. The King only orders from the best.

passages.text:
Continue
[[I had nearly finished making the clock. I had the back casing open to watch the gears as the clock struck midnight and played its chime, to make sure it worked properly.]]

links.name: I had nearly finished making the clock. I had the back casing open to watch the gears as the clock struck midnight and played its chime, to make sure it worked properly.
links.link: I had nearly finished making the clock. I had the back casing open to watch the gears as the clock struck midnight and played its chime, to make sure it worked properly.

passages.name: Continue 2

passages.text:
I had nearly finished making the clock. I had the back casing open to watch the gears as the clock struck midnight and played its chime, to make sure it worked properly.
[[Continue 3]]

links.name: Continue 3
links.link: Continue 3

passages.name: I had nearly finished making the clock. I had the back casing open to watch the gears as the clock struck midnight and played its chime, to make sure it worked properly.

passages.text:
Continue
[[But alas, I had used the wrong spring. The tension was too high. And when it struck midnight, the spring sprung out!]]

links.name: But alas, I had used the wrong spring. The tension was too high. And when it struck midnight, the spring sprung out!
links.link: But alas, I had used the wrong spring. The tension was too high. And when it struck midnight, the spring sprung out!

passages.name: Continue 3

passages.text:
But alas, I had used the wrong spring. The tension was too high. And when it struck midnight, the spring sprung out!
[[Continue 4]]

links.name: Continue 4
links.link: Continue 4

passages.name: But alas, I had used the wrong spring. The tension was too high. And when it struck midnight, the spring sprung out!

passages.text:
Continue
[[It sprung out ... directly into my eye at a high velocity! I was watching too closely.]]

links.name: It sprung out ... directly into my eye at a high velocity! I was watching too closely.
links.link: It sprung out ... directly into my eye at a high velocity! I was watching too closely.

passages.name: Continue 4

passages.text:
It sprung out ... directly into my eye at a high velocity! I was watching too closely.
[[Continue 5]]

links.name: Continue 5
links.link: Continue 5

passages.name: It sprung out ... directly into my eye at a high velocity! I was watching too closely.

passages.text:
Continue
[[If only that had killed me. But I didn't die right away. My eye became infected and I lost sight from it.]]

links.name: If only that had killed me. But I didn't die right away. My eye became infected and I lost sight from it.
links.link: If only that had killed me. But I didn't die right away. My eye became infected and I lost sight from it.

passages.name: Continue 5

passages.text:
If only that had killed me. But I didn't die right away. My eye became infected and I lost sight from it.
[[Continue 6]]

links.name: Continue 6
links.link: Continue 6

passages.name: If only that had killed me. But I didn't die right away. My eye became infected and I lost sight from it.

passages.text:
Continue
[[And then the infection overcame me and I died. It was as simple and undignified as that.]]

links.name: And then the infection overcame me and I died. It was as simple and undignified as that.
links.link: And then the infection overcame me and I died. It was as simple and undignified as that.

passages.name: Continue 6

passages.text:
And then the infection overcame me and I died. It was as simple and undignified as that.
[[Continue 7]]

links.name: Continue 7
links.link: Continue 7

passages.name: And then the infection overcame me and I died. It was as simple and undignified as that.

passages.text:
Continue
[[I was doing what I loved, but failed to achieve what would have been the greatest accomplishment of my life.]]

links.name: I was doing what I loved, but failed to achieve what would have been the greatest accomplishment of my life.
links.link: I was doing what I loved, but failed to achieve what would have been the greatest accomplishment of my life.

passages.name: Continue 7

passages.text:
I was doing what I loved, but failed to achieve what would have been the greatest accomplishment of my life.
[[Continue 8]]

links.name: Continue 8
links.link: Continue 8

passages.name: I was doing what I loved, but failed to achieve what would have been the greatest accomplishment of my life.

passages.text:
Continue
[[And that is how Samuel Tomlins, the best clockmaker in London, died.]]

links.name: And that is how Samuel Tomlins, the best clockmaker in London, died.
links.link: And that is how Samuel Tomlins, the best clockmaker in London, died.

passages.name: Continue 8
